  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>92e2f070-23b3-4b3f-a6e8-bac2033ec6d8#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hallás és az egyensúlyozás</string>
            <string language="en">Hearing and balancing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören und Ausgleichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entendre et équilibrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Audição e balançar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sentirsi ed equilibrare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακοή και εξισορρόπηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El oír y el balancear</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A halló- és egyensúlyozószerv felépítése és működése</string>
            <string language="en">Build and functioning of the hearing and balancing organ</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">érzékelés,  érzőműködés,  egyensúlyozás,  hallás,  fül,  </string>
            <string language="en">sensation, sensory functioning, balancing, hearing, ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bau und Arbeiten der Hörfähigkeit und des 
ausgleichenden Organs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction et fonctionnement de l'audition et de
l'organe d'équilibrage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configuração e funcionar do hearing e do órgão
balançando</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazione e funzionamento dell'udienza e 
dell'organo d'equilibratura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίστε και λειτουργία του ακούοντας και ισορροπώντας 
οργάνου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura y funcionamiento de la audiencia y del 
órgano que balancea</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Empfindung, sensorisches Arbeiten, Ausgleichen, hörend,
Ohr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sensation, fonctionnement sensoriel, équilibrage, 
entendant, oreille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sensation, funcionar sensory, balançar, ouvindo-se, 
orelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sensazione, funzionamento sensitivo, equilibrare, 
sententesi, orecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αίσθηση, αισθητήρια λειτουργία, εξισορρόπηση, ακοή, αυτί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sensación, funcionamiento sensorial, el balancear, 
oyendo, oído</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
